ä¸Šã®è¨˜äº‹ã«ã‚‚ã‚ã‚‹é€šã‚Š unicode.Katakana ã¯ä»¥ä¸‹ã®ç¯„å›²ã§å®šç¾©ã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ã‚‹ã€‚

var _Katakana = &RangeTable{

		{0x30a1, 0x30fa, 1},
		{0x30fd, 0x30ff, 1},

//go:build run
// +build run

package main

import (
	"fmt"
	"unicode"
)

func main() {
	i := 0
	for c := rune(0x30a1); c <= rune(0x1b167); c++ {
		if unicode.In(c, unicode.Katakana) {
			fmt.Printf("%#U ", c)
			i++
			i &= 0x0f
			if i == 0 {
				fmt.Println()
			}
		}
	}
	fmt.Println()
}

U+1B000 ã¯å¤‰ä½“ä»®åã®ã€Œã‚Œï¼ˆé€£ï¼‰ã€ã‚’æŒ‡ã™æ–‡å­—ã‚‰ã—ã„ã€‚ ã“ã‚Œã ã‘ã‚«ã‚¿ã‚«ãƒŠæ‰±ã„ãªã®ã‹ã€‚ ã¾ãŸ U+1B164 ä»¥é™ã®4æ–‡å­—ã¯å°æ›¸ãã®ã€Œãƒ°ã€ã€Œãƒ±ã€ã€Œãƒ²ã€ã€Œãƒ³ã€ã ãã†ãªã€‚

//go:build run
// +build run

package main

import (
	"fmt"
	"unicode"
)

func main() {
	i := 0
	for c := rune(0x30a1); c <= rune(0x1b167); c++ {
		if unicode.In(c, unicode.Katakana) && unicode.IsLetter(c) {
			fmt.Printf("%#U ", c)
			i++
			i &= 0x0f
			if i == 0 {
				fmt.Println()
			}
		}
	}
	fmt.Println()
}

ã“ã‚Œã§è¨˜å·ã¯ã¡ã‚ƒã‚“ã¨æ’é™¤ã§ãã‚‹ã“ã¨ãŒåˆ†ã‹ã£ãŸã€‚ ã‚ˆãƒ¼ã—ï¼Œã†ã‚€ã†ã‚€ï¼Œã‚ˆãƒ¼ã—ã€‚

æ³¨æ„ç‚¹ã¨ã—ã¦ã¯ unicode.Katakana ã§ã¯æ¿ç‚¹ãƒ»åŠæ¿ç‚¹ã®çµåˆæ–‡å­—ãŒé™¤å¤–ã•ã‚Œã‚‹ã¨ã„ã†ã“ã¨ã ã‚ã†ã‹ã€‚ ã‚ã¨åŠè§’ã‚«ãƒŠã‚’è­˜åˆ¥ã™ã‚‹ unicode.RangeTable ãƒ†ãƒ¼ãƒ–ãƒ«ã¯ãªã•ãã†ã ã€‚ ã¾ãï¼Œå˜ç´”ã ã‹ã‚‰è‡ªå‰ã§ä½œã‚Œã°ã„ã„ã‚“ã ã‘ã©ã€‚ ã“ã‚“ãªæ„Ÿã˜ã‹ãªã€‚

//go:build run
// +build run

package main

import (
	"fmt"
	"unicode"
)

var halfWidthKatakana = &unicode.RangeTable{
	R16: []unicode.Range16{
		{0xff61, 0xff9f, 1},
	},
	R32: []unicode.Range32{},
}

func main() {
	i := 0
	for c := rune(0x30a1); c <= rune(0x1b167); c++ {
		if unicode.In(c, unicode.Katakana) && unicode.In(c, halfWidthKatakana) {
			fmt.Printf("%#U ", c)
			i++
			i &= 0x0f
			if i == 0 {
				fmt.Println()
			}
		}
	}
	fmt.Println()
}

ã¨ã„ã„æ„Ÿã˜ã«åŠè§’ã‚«ãƒŠæ–‡å­—ã ã‘å–ã‚Šå‡ºã›ã‚‹ã€‚

ã¤ã„ã§ã« NFKC (Normalization Form Compatibility Composition) æ­£è¦åŒ–ã§è¨˜å·ãŒã©ã®ã‚ˆã†ã«å¤‰æ›ã•ã‚Œã‚‹ã‹è¦‹ã¦ã¿ã‚ˆã†ã€‚ ä»¥ä¸‹ã¯å¤‰æ›ã•ã‚Œã‚‹ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã®ã¿ã‚’åˆ—æŒ™ã—ãŸã‚‚ã®ã€‚

//go:build run
// +build run

package main

import (
	"fmt"
	"unicode"

	"golang.org/x/text/unicode/norm"
)

func main() {
	for c := rune(0x30a1); c <= rune(0x1b167); c++ {
		if unicode.In(c, unicode.Katakana) {
			n := norm.NFKC.String(string(c))
			if n != string(c) {
				fmt.Printf("%#U -> %s\n", c, n)
			}
		}
	}
}

var _Hiragana = &RangeTable{
	R16: []Range16{
		{0x3041, 0x3096, 1},
		{0x309d, 0x309f, 1},
	},
	R32: []Range32{
		{0x1b001, 0x1b11e, 1},
		{0x1b150, 0x1b152, 1},
		{0x1f200, 0x1f200, 1},
	},
}

ã¨å®šç¾©ã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ã‚‹ã€‚ ãªã®ã§ 0x3041 ã‹ã‚‰ 0x1f200 ã®ç¯„å›²ã§ã‚¹ã‚­ãƒ£ãƒ³ã™ã‚Œã°ã„ã„ã‹ãªã€‚ ã¨ã‚Šã‚ãˆãš

//go:build run
// +build run

package main

import (
	"fmt"
	"unicode"
)

func main() {
	i := 0
	for c := rune(0x3041); c <= rune(0x1f200); c++ {
		if unicode.In(c, unicode.Hiragana) {
			fmt.Printf("%#U ", c)
			i++
			i &= 0x0f
			if i == 0 {
				fmt.Println()
			}
		}
	}
	fmt.Println()
}

//go:build run
// +build run

package main

import (
	"fmt"
	"unicode"

	"golang.org/x/text/unicode/norm"
)

func main() {
	for c := rune(0x3041); c <= rune(0x1f200); c++ {
		if unicode.In(c, unicode.Hiragana) {
			n := norm.NFKC.String(string(c))
			if n != string(c) {
				fmt.Printf("%#U -> %s\n", c, n)
			}
		}
	}
}

ã¨ã„ã†è¨˜äº‹ã‚’ Zenn ã«ä¸Šã’ãŸãŒï¼Œèª¿å­ã«ä¹—ã£ã¦ Go ãƒ‘ãƒƒã‚±ãƒ¼ã‚¸åŒ–ã—ã¦ã¿ãŸã€‚

  • spiegel-im-spiegel/jzodiac: Japanese Zodiac

ã“ã‚Œã‚’ä½¿ã£ã¦ï¼ŒãŸã¨ãˆã°

// +build run

package main

import (
    "flag"
    "fmt"
    "os"
    "time"

    "github.com/spiegel-im-spiegel/jzodiac"
)

func main() {
    flag.Parse()
    args := flag.Args()
    if len(args) < 1 {
        fmt.Fprintln(os.Stderr, os.ErrInvalid)
        return
    }
    for _, s := range args {
        t, err := time.Parse("2006-01-02", s)
        if err != nil {
            fmt.Fprintln(os.Stderr, err)
            continue
        }
        kan, shi := jzodiac.ZodiacYearNumber(t.Year())
        fmt.Printf("Year %v is %v%v\n", t.Year(), kan, shi)
        kan, shi = jzodiac.ZodiacDayNumber(t)
        fmt.Printf("Day %v is %v%v\n", t.Format("2006-01-02"), kan, shi)
    }
}
